Message:
Thanks to me...?
But, I messed
the whole thing up...

Just as I hung my head in shame,
the travelin’ gunslinger
pushed me forward.

“Now, give another
big round of applause
for my tiny assistant here!”

“What’re you saying?
Thanks to you,
everybody had a great time,
didn’t they?
Just take a look for yourself!”

Lookin’ out at the crowd,
everyone was clappin’
with big smiles on their faces.

All for a scruffy lookin’ girl
like me...

It made me so happy,
I felt myself break into a smile.

“You probably have a knack
for making people smile, y’know.

I mean, just look at what
a great smile you’ve got!”

“Alright, I can’t let you
take all the spotlight.

Gather ’round, ’cause the world’s
greatest gunslinger Cordie’s show
is far from over!”

That was my fated meetin’
with the great Cordie.
